name: parboiled IR-64
description: Experience the consistent quality and versatility of Parboiled IR-64 Rice. A popular medium-grain indica rice, IR-64 is put through a parboiling process where it is steeped, steamed, and dried while still in its husk. This method gelatinizes the starch, fortifies the grain, and results in a firm, separate, and non-sticky texture when cooked. Parboiled IR-64 is celebrated for its excellent cooking attributes, improved nutritional profile, and extended shelf life. It retains more vitamins and minerals compared to white rice and is highly resistant to breaking during milling and cooking. Ideal for a wide range of global cuisines, including pilafs, biryanis, and side dishes where individual grain separation is desired, offering a reliable and economical choice for households and foodservice alike.
seoTitle: Premium Parboiled IR-64 Rice | Medium Grain | Bulk Supplier
seoDescription: Discover high-quality Parboiled IR-64 Rice, known for its firm, separate grains, and robust cooking performance. Ideal for global culinary needs, sourced from leading mills with excellent specifications.

name: Puja Masuri Rice
description: Puja Masuri Rice, often recognized as Sona Masuri, is a premium medium-grain aromatic rice highly favored in South Indian cuisine. Cultivated primarily in the fertile regions of Andhra Pradesh, Telangana, and Karnataka, this rice variety is celebrated for its lightweight, fluffy texture when cooked, and its subtly sweet, earthy aroma. It is low in starch, making it an excellent choice for daily meals, pilafs, biryanis, and traditional dishes like idli and dosa. Our Puja Masuri Rice undergoes stringent quality checks to ensure consistent grain size, purity, and optimal moisture content, promising a delightful culinary experience with every serving. It's a healthy and delicious staple that embodies the rich agricultural heritage of India.
seoTitle: Premium Puja Masuri Rice | Aromatic Medium Grain for Authentic Cuisine
